title: Tricarbonyl rhenium(I) complexes with 8-hydroxyquinolines: structural, chemical, antibacterial, and anticancer characteristics
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,18080-18092
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03141E, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Krzysztof Łyczko, Anna Pogorzelska, Urszula Częścik, Mirosława Koronkiewicz, Joanna E. Rode, Elżbieta Bednarek, Robert Kawęcki, Karolina Węgrzyńska, Anna Baraniak, Małgorzata Milczarek, Jan Cz. Dobrowolski
Twelve tricarbonyl Re(I) complexes with bidentate 8-hydroxyquinolinato and monodentate diazole ligands were synthesized, characterized by scXRD, IR, NMR, and UV-Vis methods, and checked for antibacterial and anticancer activity.
